posts.post_title: WTB: Chief Bender t216 Striped Hat
posts.post_content: Looking for one with good eye appeal.  Sorry, but I don't do offers so please send prices.:)

just some information

there are 2 versions of this card. 1 with Philadelphia caption and 1 with Baltimore caption with Baltimore being the tougher. Good luck in your hunt

[quote name="cfc1909" post=1120843]just some information

there are 2 versions of this card. 1 with Philadelphia caption and 1 with Baltimore caption with Baltimore being the tougher. Good luck in your hunt[/QUOTE]

Yes I am aware.:)

I could go either way.
